Deadly_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your death infused weapon, causing negative energy and cold damage while also reducing the target's chance to hit.
Deadly_Cut.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Deadly_Bolt.display_help: You launch a blast of death energy at a target, causing cold and negative energy damage. The target also suffers reduced movement and attack speeds.
Deadly_Bolt.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Deadly_Blast.display_help: You fire a powerful blast of death energy at a single target, causing cold and negative energy damage. The target also suffers a reduced chance to hit.
Deadly_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Deadly_Hack.display_help: You perform a forceful hack with your death infused weapon, causing negative energy and cold damage while also reducing the target's movement and attack speeds.
Deadly_Hack.display_target_help: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Deadly_Circle.display_help: You slash at multiple targets around you with your death infused weapon, striking them for negative energy and cold damage. Affected targets also suffer a reduction in their defenses.
Deadly_Circle.display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Negative Energy/Cold), -DEF (Foe, All)

Terrifying_Stare.display_help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.
Terrifying_Stare.display_target_help: You are terrified and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Boon_of_Death.display_help: You channel death energy through yourself to a targeted foe. Boon of Death drains life energy from the target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe suffers cold damage and a reduction in their damage potential, while you and your nearby allies are healed.
Boon_of_Death.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Deaths_Embrace.display_help: You focus death energy on a single target, chilling the air so massively that the target is caught in a block of ice. The affected foe suffers cold damage and negative energy damage over time. The target also suffers reductions in their movement and attack speeds.
Deaths_Embrace.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Negative Energy, DoT), Hold (Foe), -Speed (Foe, All), -Rech (Foe)
Deaths_Embrace.display_target_help: You are held in place and suffering negative energy damage over time. Additionally, your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

Dark_Blast.display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Night_Fall.display_help: You fire a cone shaped burst of negative energy, striking all foes within range for negative energy damage. Affected foes also suffer a reduced chance to hit.
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Moonbeam.display_help: You fire a very powerful burst of negative energy at a target, causing negative energy damage and reducing their chance to hit.
Moonbeam.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Dark_Grasp.display_help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering negative energy damage. The target will also suffer a reduced chance to hit.
Dark_Grasp.display_target_help: You are held in place and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Resistance.display_help: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow. They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self (Auto), +RES(Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic)

Self_Destruct.display_help: You are only able to remain material for a few minutes before your soul permanently expires.

Ghastly_Blast.display_help: You unleash a blast of pure necromantic energy at a target, causing negative energy damage and reducing their chance to hit.
Ghastly_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Resistance.display_help: Grave Knights are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy, Toxic and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self (Auto) +RES(Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Slow, Cold, Negative, Toxic, Psionic)

Super_Leap.display_help: You are capable of Super Leap.

Hack.display_help: You perform a hacking strike that causes lethal damage and reduces the target's defenses.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick slash that causes lethal damage and reduces the target's defenses.

Resistance.display_help: The Lich is resistant to Sleep and Fear. It is also resistant to Negative Energy, Toxic and Cold damage.

Dark_Blast.display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Torrent.display_help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

Super_Leap.display_help: You are capable of Super Leap.

Shadow_Punch.display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy before punching a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Smite.display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy and unleash a powerful attack on a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.
Smite.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Dark_Blast.display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Shadow_Maul.display_help: You wrap your arms with negative energy before striking out with a series of blows that deal smashing and negative energy damage to nearby targets in front of you. These blows also cloud your target's vision, lowering their chance to hit.
Shadow_Maul.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Dark_Regeneration.display_help: You channel negative energy into your target in order to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, healing yourself with the drained essence. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed.

Placate.display_help: You trick a foe into dropping their attack focus on you. When successful, you will also be hidden for a short time.

Aura_of_Fear.display_help: You wrap yourself in a nightmarish aura of fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit.

Midnight_Grasp.display_help: You form negative energy into dark tentacles that can immobilize a foe, reducing their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force in the form of negative energy damage.
Midnight_Grasp.display_target_help: You have been immobilized and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Shadow_Punch.display_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Shadow Punch.
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Shadow Punch.

Smite.display_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Smite attack.
Smite.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Smite attack.

Soul_Drain.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
Soul_Drain.display_target_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Siphon_Life.display_help: You've been affected by a Siphon Life attack. Your Accuracy is reduced.
Siphon_Life.display_target_help: You've been affected by a Siphon Life attack. Your Accuracy is reduced.

Gloom.display_help: The Gloom is slowly draining your life and reducing your Accuracy.
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is slowly draining your life and reducing your Accuracy.

Dark_Blast.display_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Dark Blast.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Dark Blast.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.
Brawl.display_target_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

Resistance.display_help: Skulls are resistant to negative energy damage, but vulnerable to energy damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: Skulls are resistant to negative energy damage, but vulnerable to energy damage.

Resistance_AV.display_help: The most powerful leaders of the Skulls retain their resistance to negative energy damage, but are no longer vulnerable to energy damage.
Resistance_AV.display_target_help: The most powerful leaders of the Skulls retain their resistance to negative energy damage, but are no longer vulnerable to energy damage.

Burst.display_help: You quickly fire a burst of rounds at a single target. The target suffers lethal damage over time and reduced defenses.

Slug.display_help: You fire a single slug at a targeted foe, causing lethal damage and potentially knocking the target down.Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Slug.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Automatic_Fire.display_help: You fire a fully automatic burst at a target, striking multiple foes if they are caught in the burst's cone. Affected targets suffer lethal damage over time.

Shotgun.display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.
Shotgun.display_target_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

Submachine_Gun.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.
Submachine_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

Fireman_Axe.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Fireman Axe.
Fireman_Axe.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Fireman Axe.

Baseball_Bat.display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.
Baseball_Bat.display_target_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

Revolver.display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.
Revolver.display_target_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

Sledgehammer.display_help: This heavy, but unwieldy and slow Sledgehammer can knock down foes.
Sledgehammer.display_target_help: This heavy, but unwieldy and slow Sledgehammer can knock down foes.

Pistols.display_help: You fire a single round from one of your pistols, causing lethal damage to your target.

Dual_Shot.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dual_Shot.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Submachine_Gun.display_help: You fire your submachine gun at a single target, causing lethal damage over time and reducing the target's defenses.

Focused_Burst.display_help: You fire a focused burst from your submachine gun, causing lethal damage over time and potentially knocking the target down.
Focused_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Grave_Knight.display_help: You summon a Grave Knight to assist you in battle.

Shadow_Punch.display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy before punching a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Dark_Blast.display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Gloom.display_help: The Gloom is slowly draining your life and reducing your Accuracy.
Gloom.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and a reduced chance to hit.

Smite.display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy and unleash a powerful attack on a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.
Smite.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Siphon_Life.display_help: You siphon the life out of a target, causing negative energy damage and healing yourself. The affected target also suffers a reduced chance to hit.
Siphon_Life.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Soul_Extraction.display_help: You can extract the soul, creating a ghost to aid you in battle.

Soul_Drain.display_help: You drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your damage potential and chance to hit.

Lich.display_help: You summon a Lich to assist you in battle.
